column3: If you set your traps up properly, or they worked, they would be sitting ducks!
Why are you blaming on me? Your sniping didn't change anything either!
The bullet of Kashasty Lovelace does not fly forever.^If trapped, with adequate positioning, we would have been free from her attacks.
Bianca, do you now understand that victory is impossible when a battle lacks strategy?
Aarrrgh! Stop making so much noise! I am not accepting such defeat!
